text: Ndipo dera lililonse limene uchokera, yang’ana nkhope yako ku Mzikiti Woyera popemphera. Kulikonse kumene mungakhale, yang’anani nkhope zanu komweko kuti anthu asakhale ndi nkhani yokudzudzulani inu kupatula okhawo amene ndi olakwa. Motero musawaope iwo koma opani Ine kuti ndikwaniritse madalitso anga pa inu ndiponso kuti mukhale otsogozedwa
